name: Tower Rush (FallseYT)
description:
Tower Rush is a game where you have to run on rectangular prisms in order to live, fall and you die.

Fun Fact: This game was originally a VR game, but I didn't like how it felt. So I ported it over to pc.

I'm going to try to push out weekly updates, but it is hard to do. Feel free to mod the game if you can.

Play on Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/tower_rush/687074
